name: City Football Arena
shortDescription: Top-notch football facility with all-weather turf.
description: Our City Football Arena offers a professional standard pitch with lighting and seating.
highlight: Certified FIFA-quality turf for top performance and safety.

description: Equipped with NBA standard hoops and electronic scoreboards.

shortDescription: Clay tennis courts with excellent drainage.

shortDescription: Olympic size pool with heated water.
